description: Valid safety events logged by a Vehicle Gateway (VG) in a customer org over 5 mph.

schema.name: org_id
schema.description: The Internal ID for the customer's Samsara Org

schema.name: date
schema.description: The date on which the event occurred in 'YYYY-mm-dd' format

schema.name: created_at
schema.description: The time in UTC that the event record was created

schema.name: device_id
schema.description: The ID of the Vehice Gateway (VG)

schema.name: event_ms
schema.description: The UNIX epoch time (milliseconds) on which the event occurred

schema.name: speed_mph
schema.description: The last GPS speed recording in miles per hour in the event period

schema.name: accel_type
schema.description: The ENUM value of a harsh acceleration type -- (e.g., 1:'haAccel', 5:'haCrash') /n/n[HarshAccelTypeEnum Proto](https://github.com/samsara-dev/backend/blob/5c378d60f59e9eb1f6fcd010df69877defa80f16/docker/service/us-west-2/plccompileserver/go/src/samsaradev.io/hubproto/object_stat.pb.go#L63)
